text: "Too Late for Love" is a 1983 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and is the fourth and final single from their third studio album Pyromania. It went to number 86 in the United Kingdom and number 9 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. ==Track listing== # "Too Late for Love" # "Foolin'" # "High 'n' Dry (Saturday Night)" ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Def Leppard songs
title: Too Late for Love (Def Leppard song)
